messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/4/2003 4:30:26 PM Eastern Standard Time,
abtleo@... writes:
> And most flowers don't bloom all winter.
>
But isn't Edelweiss BEAUTIFUL! <g>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] bitchin'
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes, I ll miss things here.  They re things I could live without, but they re nice here.  I get homesick, but I don t miss home.  Where the heck is that,
messages.messageBody:
2/4/03 16:33:

> But that's what I meant! You WILL miss some things, no matter how homesick
> you might be NOW. When you're gone, the neat things about the place you left
> will be JUST as missed as home is now.

Yes, I'll miss things here. They're things I could live without, but
they're nice here. I get homesick, but I don't miss home. Where the heck
is that, anyway? This is my 9th house in 10 years of marriage. Tim's 6th.
I miss my country. I know lots of people don't like it, but I'm happily
American. I like our ways.

I don't gripe constantly, but I do have down times. This is one of them. I
have tried to bloom here, but in some places the soil is rocky and thin.
And most flowers don't bloom all winter.

brenda
